introduction: A SHORT DARWINIAN FILMRT: 8 min, 16 mm, color, 1994Editor: Milica ZivojinovicCamera: Radoslav VladicMusic: Aleksandar LoknerWritten, produced and directed by: Goran RadovanovicFestivals: Tampere, Krakow, Hamburg, Torino, Trieste, Lisbon, Augsburg, Beograd, Osnabruik, Bari, Neubrandenburg, Amsterdam, Milano, Goer idt.Awards: Grand Prix, Torino 1995, Short Film Days, Hamburgu1995, Belgrade Documentary and Short Film Festival, 1995, Lisbon 1996, Goer 1996
